channel.title: I need a 24-7 hoster for PhatScape
channel.description:
Well, my old hoster quit.. but im in need of another one.
Heres what you'll need..
2GB+ RAM [Dual Proccessor Hopefully..] Good internet, [Comcast or Charter] Good Forum Administrator Mature. Will do it for exchange of 20% of the donations we get.
I really need this guys, i got 200 members worrying about it..
and it is Christmas...
-Blu Phat
IF YOU WANT TO HOST FOR PHATSCAPE, ADD blu_phat@phatscape.net ON MSN!

item.title: I need a 24-7 hoster for PhatScape
item.dc:creator: @ersertaz ersertaz
item.description:
@ersertaz wrote:

Silver Lining:

Has anyone really donated to your shitty server?

40M ^_^.
Suck it, I wasnt the one updating it. My Host was. I asked for 1 thing, he did another, so.

-Blu

Charter sucks, btw
It doesnt matter, Either Charter High Speed or Comcast is prefered. I have Comcast. It doesnt matter to me. So enough with the Flaming SPAM..
